song.title: Threesome of Zeroes
song.info:
(c) Blue Zone /Immortal Coil - December 1999 - Slovakia
Well, once again after 1000 years we have three zeroes in year number, so that's where the title comes from. :) Enjoy this (yet another :) ) space pop tune. Some resonant filters used. This is shrinked version, mail me for original size. (1.6mb)
Samples from: Hunz,Necros,Teque,Scorpik,Ryan Cramer,Skaven,Cybelius and myself
Any commercial use without my personal permission is prohibited!
bluezone@fornax.elf.stuba.sk bluezone@mystique.sk
Have a nice year 2000.
Blue Zone
